articles.content: Sector and thematic mutual fund schemes are getting more popular by the day. Of all the equity-oriented and hybrid new fund offers (NFO) launched from January 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024, sector and t… [+7042 chars]

articles.title: RVNL shares rally over 1,000% in 2 years. Should investors book profits or buy the dip? - The Economic Times
articles.description: RVNL Share Price: RVNL shares have surged over 1,000% in 2 years driven by strong order inflows and execution. Investors are debating whether to book profits or buy the dip.
